head_commit.message:
Use Conda for Windows (#6736)

* Standard Dev Env: Windows

* split up script so it's usefull for both ci and users

* Attempt 1 - Building Conda-Windows with taskcluster, whish me luck!

* add a name for build tasks

* yay,me that was surprisingly close

* fix x-win script

* use clang-cl for go

* install gcc on conda

* Debugging: Why is taskcluster-python used and not conda's ..

* Force conda python

* fix env name...

* force env python, not base python

* do not build an msi for now

* do publish the msi

* update documentation

* fix dict

* put mac-os only things in it's own bucket

* fix channel installatioN

* debugging tc failure

* test with no manifest run

* why is it using the wrong linker...

* Add llvm back c:

* Commit code smells.

* update docs

head_commit.message:
VPN-4706, VPN-4709 - Initialize Glean instance from the Android Daemon (#6809)

* Update Glean submodule v52.6.0

* VPN-4709 - Update Kotlin to 1.8

* Initialize Glean instance on Android Daemon and manage upload state
